summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ReWear POS new features. All requested functionality working correctly including image upload for custom categories, Excel exports with custom categories included, and login system.
passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (24/24 existing tests passed)

Custom category creation with image upload (base64, max 500KB)
Price matrix Excel download includes custom categories
Login system with admin/1234 and smilla/1234
Categories tab with image upload UI (Hinzuf√ºgen button)
